title: Initial Consultation
description: 3D scan and assessment to determine if aligners are suitable for you

title: Treatment Planning
description: Custom 3D treatment plan showing your week-by-week progress

title: Aligner Creation
description: Your custom aligners are precisely manufactured for your unique smile

title: Active Treatment
description: Wear aligners 20-22 hours daily, changing every 1-2 weeks

title: Retention Phase
description: Retainers maintain your new smile position permanently
